text: Pfipfila twomanya ghamalaghitso ng'aghekighwe bae kwaajili ye iwanu iwanoghile, ila ghekighwa kwaajili ya iwanu ing'awokinda ghamalaghitso na iwolema kutegheletsa utawala na iwanu iwombetsa Imulungu na wane nzambi na ing'awahenzeluke na iwanu iwalihela idini na iwanu iwokoma aba tsawo na mai tsawo na iwokoma wanu,
